column4: hello.....i am wondering how you change the appearance of the taskbar or whatever it is called?
is there a program or something?
> right click on it
and what to i click?
: right click on the upper taskbar and you follow the appropriate link to change its appearence
humm kaffeine is really good at managing DVB-T, I am impressed
yesterday someone showed off their desktop in here and their taskbar thing looked really cool....it was like shiny and black
how do i do that?
: any screenshot or example on the web to describe it to us ?
yeah let me find it
here is the link: http://img207.imageshack.us/img207/5020/screenshot100ql9.png
how did that person do that with the taskbar on the bottom?
: I guess it's simply a background image
what?
im talkin about the taskbar
on the very bottom
: me too
how did he do that?
: right click on it > properties > appearance, there you can choose to use a background for it
: with a good png image, you can obtain a good rendering of the taskbar :)
there is no properties when i right click....just appearance and there is nothing there to make it look like that
: or maybe a theme, I don't know evrey of them but I guess there are some very stylish ones
